评论详情: Was perfect fit and looked adorable.  Fabric was nice quality.
Easy to wear, fabric breathable. Tons of compliments!
I got the large I’m 5’2” and 140lb the large was loose but fit good. If I had more time I may have gotten a medium but it still looks great with my cosplay!🖤🤍💜💚
This was a good quick costume piece, it worked well with the rest of my costume and I got a lot of compliments on the skirt.
Used this to layer a skirt for the Ren Faire and it was perfect! It’s thin enough to layer, so if you want to wear it alone it won’t look super great.

评论概述: Runs a little small, size up 1 to 2 sizes
评论详情: I would size up at least one size maybe 2 if you are between sizes. I am usually a 2X but ordered a 4X to be safe because I don't have much time before the event I wanted this piece for. I could have probably gotten away with a 3X as it fits pretty lose. Material is light and slightly transparent so I recommend wearing at least something under it, but the light material is a blessing if you are going to be somewhere warm. The length of the front part of the skirt is easily adjustable which I really like and it really added some flair to my ren-fair outfit! Love this item and may order in another color for other events or costumes.
It's super sheer, but I wear it over another skirt, so it doesn't matter.  It works perfectly for my witchy and steampunk looks.

Exactly like the photo! The material is almost like a very thin windbreaker. The waist band is stretchy and the rest of it, even though very lightweight, sits very nicely and looks fancy. A perfect piece to tie your renaissance outfit together! The part that bunches up is adjustable with strings so you can pull it higher up or extend it lower. Very happy I chose this. My outfit would not have been complete without it (:
It’s comfortable and it can go as high or low as you want. Not see through.
Very happy with the purchase. Comfortable, easy to adjust high-low.
Very pretty skirt. Runs way to small
Fit was great, quality excellent, I expected a bit different color, a purpleness to the fabric, but was a light brown. Still worked. I'd recommend it.
Very cheaply made. I am stuck with this purchase because I was waiting for my replacement to arrive and I did not want to not have a backup. Not worth the money at all

Color is vibrant and pretty. Got a lot of compliments. These skirts are perfect for renaissance faires and similar events. Good hardy material. It was a little long in the back for me even cinched up, but I'm short so that's expected.

The skirt is true to color. It is not see-through like the picture suggests. It cinches nicely in the front. But the back looks really flat in comparison. I typically wear a small, I ordered a small but you cannot wear this low on your hips. So I had to wear it higher around my waist. if I would’ve went with a medium so I could wear it on my hips, it would just be too bushy, if that makes sense. I returned because it did not work for the costume I wanted. Quality was nice for the cost. The stitching looked good. I’m not sure how it hold up in a strong washing though.  I would definitely wash it on delicate her hand wash and hang to dry.
I love this skirt. At first I thought it felt cheap but it doesn’t look it. I love that the front is adjustable so you can go as short as you want. I think I got a large

Fabric is lightweight- I ordered black. It is adjustable in front to your preference. I’ll wear it with tights. It’s adequate for whatever costume you need. I ordered 2 sizes up and probably could have been ok with only 1 size up. Skirts are more forgiving, but it’s a simple fix if you’re handy with a sewing machine.  It’s not too flimsy, so for a cheap piece of clothing, it’s not too bad.
For the almost $40 I paid for this the fabric is very see-through and thin. Cute and fits well. Be sure and use the size chart. But VERY thin material

The skirt fits in the correct size. The fabric is thin.Since it's meant to look like taffeta, that is disappointing. OK for Ren Faire as is. For steam punk it would be improved by an underskirt or bustle.
Cute, but fabric is thin and you can see through parts of the panels.
The fabric is really cheap it’s not worth the price and it’s hard to find the lace to tie it up. I believe it should’ve come tied?
Fits really nicely, I ordered XL (36in waist) and it is perfect
I loved the material,  very silky feel. Not see through.  The fit was as expected.  I'm 5'2" at 180.
My wife bought this for her witch costume for Halloween. She is petite in size but this fits perfectly. Fabric is nice and she’s planning to use for other events.
Worth the purchase.. love how the front has pull string to adjust the front of the dress.
Stretchy and comfy. Worked great for my beetlejuice costume.
Love the fit. Size medium. Love the fact the length is adjustable in the front.

评论概述: sewn incorrectly causing it to not lay flat.
评论详情: The waist band was sewn in crooked and upside down on one end causing it to not pay correctly against the body. It bunches in the back. It’s see through even in coffee
Cheap costume feel, too large, not worth $10
Fits well, great for the price
Saw the shirt and instantly thought of Beetlejuice! Had to create a cute version

Absolutely awesome skirt for a quick pirate costume. It is thin but comfortable material. It can be adjusted in front so you can be sexy, sultry or modest. I felt very very good in this skirt. Waist has some stretch too. Fit was better than expected. I may get more like it in other colors for other cosplay events.
Skirt fit fine and I loved it. It felt good when wearing It.
This was a hit for my pirate outfit. Got tons of compliments, I felt like I looked slimmer in it. I’m 5’8” and weigh 182 and got the XL it fit perfectly.

评论概述: Very disappointing for the price point. Returning the product was easy.
评论详情: The material was thin and of poor quality

The skirt fit as I expected. It was a little longer than anticipated. I'm 5'3" and the back of the skirt reaches the middle of my calf, if not lower. I love that you can adjust the length of the front of the skirt to however long or short you want it. The material is thinner than expected. It's more like what you'd get with a Halloween costume. Overall, I'm happy with the skirt and would recommend it.
I love this so much its perfect for my cosplay and its so soft and very starchy in the waste

I am short so was fearful that this would be too long!! Nope - was just right once I tightened up the draw strings and tied them in a bow!  Skirt can be adjusted for modesty and a bit of fun!  I wore this with a black top and fishnets for a fun Halloween party.

评论概述: Definitely order up a couple sizes
评论详情: Pretty sheer but I expected that. Fit is definitely small I'm glad I order a 5x because it fits perfect. I'm usually a 2x with my waist being 40 in. If you are a curvy girl definitely order up a couple sizes which will help make it look more flowy. Can't wait to wear this to a Renaissance festival!
Not much to dislike about this skirt. Fits just right, feels comfortable and the stretch is pretty decent. It's nice and long. I'm 5'10 about 210 pounds. And is a perfect fit.

评论概述: What you see is what you get!!
评论详情: I like that we got EXACTLY what we paid for!! The size chart is pretty accurate, maybe runs a little large but is good
Love this skirt, is perfect for Victorian Vampire costume.  Material has a slightly sheen, not see thru at all and well made!

Orderd black. I did not like the sheerness of the fabric. Plan to wear shorts under it. For the price I expected better fabric. I wear a sz 18/20 jeans and got the 6x. It fits ok but it is short in back, even at my 5'5 height. Bought for steampunk costume. Was hoping to get several wears out of it but not sure it will last once.

I would normally wear size large-x large I was worried about ordering according to the sellers size chart which said I needed a 5x. But the skirt arrived quickly and fits well. I will order from this seller again.

评论概述: Great Skirt Although See Through On Patterns
评论详情: It’s a great skirt, the material where the patterns are is see through though, and it can get stuck at the buckles, but besides that, it’s great material and great to wear.
I ordered a Medium and it fit fine. It has an elastic like ribbon on the inside of the front to hike it up but the back of the skirt sits around mid thigh on me (5'6 and ~160lbs)
Love this. Fits great and made well.

The skirt is too big for me, waist wise. You can pull the strings to make the top short or long, which is easy. I tucked the skirt up into my corset so it wouldn't be loose & baggy on my hips. It's decent quality & great for my intended use.

This is my back up skirt. Even though it's pretty sheer I don't feel naked. It's great for costumes or cosplay but I think I might just add it to my wardrobe. Light enough for summer, too thin for winter I would imagine. Still happy with my purchase.

Nice skirt with an adjustable front- you can make it shorter or longer. The material is definitely costume-y, I wouldn’t get it if you’re actually intending to wear it with an outfit. It was great for the Ren faire, really breezy and light so it wasn’t too hot, I put on shorts underneath it for my own sake. I was actually concerned that it wouldn’t fit around my thighs but the back was actually stretchy enough for it to so that was really cool (I’m a pants size 18 us for reference) It came quickly and can definitely handle some outings.
Love this skirt!! Got it to be an extra layer to my bard costume and it's perfect!! Just the right touch to separate a bard from the crowds XD
Exactly what I needed

This is a beautiful skirt, I would wear it to rag, however, my left thigh would be jelous of the other that can rock this skirt... get a size bigger cause it's not stretchy - which is fine, it is not meant to be, just don't think it will. Overall it's gorgeous and as in picture!
I love except it ran really small, still waiting the placement, but fabric is wonderful,  which is why I reordered it.

I love this skirt. It looked perfect with the outfit I bought it for. (Not the best picture, its in the bathroom at the club) 🤣 It is a little sheer, so if you're more modest, you may want to wear something under it.
This fit to size and will work great for many different costume outfits from Steampunk to Pirate. I love it!
I love the skirt and I'm looking forward to wearing it

This dress was perfect for my event. The material stretch. Im 5"1, 135lbs a small would've work. My daughter who is 5"4 150lbs can fit this. I went with a med. Thankful for the draw string. I love that I could adjust the height for the dress front. Go with your regular size.
It fit perfect. I love the fact that I can adjust the length in the front. May have to buy in another color.
This was extremely comfortable and just what I needed for a saloon girl Halloween costume.
I ordered the red & black striped skirt in a size xxl. I am in between sizes 14 to 16. It fits perfect. The material is awesome. I am so happy. Yay

The fit was great. I did not have to make any adjustments to it. The elastic waist is very comfortable and there are options on how long or short you want the skirt to appear. I bought the black, which goes with just about everything, and I won the costume contest on Halloween!!!! I would recommend this product to anyone, well worth it.
Skirt was perfect!

评论概述: A tad bit to sheer need slip or leggings on underneath
评论详情: Supper light weight & comfortable, definitely need a slip or leggings on underneath to avoid see through.
Was perfect for my Halloween costume! I could have gone with a med but this tucked in my corset and worked great!
Perfect costume skirt! Love that the front length is adjustable. I’m 5’6” and 120 lbs and a small fit perfect!
It’s exactly what I was looking for! Idk why some reviews say the sizing is off, I ordered a medium like I usually would and it fits perfect
Looks just like the picture. The only concern is to read the sizing chart!!!! I’m normally a medium but in the sizing chart I’m a 3XL and it fits perfectly.

So I am a 2X/20 and I ordered the 6X. It fits great, it’s as described in the photo and description. It has two little drawstrings on the front to raise the front of the skirt. Very happy with my purchase! Definitely SIZE UP 😁

I bought this product for my wife. She finds it pleasant, comfortable, and attractive. Particularly nice features are the skirt's sheer, enticingly see-through quality and the drawstrings which allow the wearer to raise the front hem as high as she wants.
Loved the matirial and color !! Was perfect for my grab
Fits great and easy to adjust. It’s a bit sheer when you first look at it but once it was on you couldn’t see anything underneath!
Perfect especially for the price. I have 40 inch hips and 33 waist and ordered a medium. Perfect for cosplay.

Super cute love how you can draw the front up shorter, i ordered a large but returned for a med runs large and has elastic band so there is alot of give, but for the steam punk look this will do the job, im in love with this one love the color.

Very thin and cheap material. It isn't too flattering for my big butt. It kinda makes it look bigger than it is. I'll keep it for when i decide to lose weight. Ill eventually wear it. Definitely don't regret buying it either.
This is honestly pretty terrible quality and quite thin, I had to wear a second layer of skirt underneath to keep from exposing myself
Absolutely loved it! I’m petite and went with the small. What’s great about this skirt is that you can adjust the length in front.
On the smaller size - I would go a size up

评论概述: Material is much thinner than expected.
评论详情: Product looks exactly like the picture.  Item fits well.  Skirt is made of an unknown material and very thin. It will be worn layered as was planned, but will not be able to wear it alone because of how thin it is.
I love this item!!!
I'm 210 and this fit great! I got a large :) and there was still lots more stretch to it so honestly can imagine I could of went smaller but it fits perfect.
It’s a super cute design, but it’s very sheer material, very see-through.
Fit great but came one day too late for our party.. overall great product
Very gorgeous skirt! Fit perfectly, nice fabric, and looks exactly like the image. I'm very pleased with it!

Size is a little big, but the larger concern was on the material. For the cost, just not what I would expect. Very cheap fabric, and when you try to hike the skirt in front as shown, it doesn't stay unless you further tie the strings somehow
Very nice quality! It fit perfectly!
Cute
Being plus sized ya have to create your own costume as nothing fits off the rack!  Added skirt to leggings for a pirate Halloween costume adjusting to preferred height and it was a hit!!
Loved everything about this skirt. Worked so great for my Halloween costume.
Great skirt! Fits as expected and very comfortable.
This was a great skirt! a bit more sheer than i wanted but when bustled it was fantastic!

Absolutely loved it. The adjustable straps were amazing to transform the skirt anyway I wanted and I’ll def be keeping this skirt for future looks! I am the one on the right, my sister on the left was wearing a black version she loved hers as well!

评论概述: You get what you pay for!
评论详情: So for the price it was definitely what I expected. Sizing was perfect, I’m right in between 16-18 and there’s still plenty of room. It’s see through but not terribly, although I got black so I cannot account for other colors.

The sizing on this product is way off. Desptie taking all the measurements and comparing them to the size chart and picking a size larger it was still way smaller then expected. Upon futher inspection I found the measurements were way smaller then advertised.
The item was just as described and was of good quality. I would order from here again.

I ordered the black on size  Large and then decided I wanted the Brown. I ordered the Brown in extra large and they both fit the same! I love this skirt! Easy to pair with my own clothes. I would wear this as regular a skirt!!
Actually it was nicer than I expected. Well made and fit just right
Great skirt for a costume! It was comfortable and I will use it again. Great product for the price!
Arrived timely.  As described.  Made for a great witch skirt.
